attributes.action: vote of no confidence in the coaliation
attributes.additional_details: i would like a vote of no confidence is this joke of a coalition, nearly 300 tax rises ,nhs being sold off,police officers being cut, thay dont no there back from ther front on europe ,disabled people left to die while there benifits are sorted out on appel its about time we got rid .

rejection.details: Votes of no confidence are a matter for Parliament not the Government.
